data.name: Coastiality
data.description:
Your visit to the theme park was over much too quickly?
 
Imagine what it would be like if you could re-live some of your adventures anytime and anywhere – directly on your smartphone AND in 360° virtual reality (VR)!

Welcome to the Coastiality app! Discover a virtual world which is already being offered in theme parks worldwide. Ride your favourite rollercoaster again or re-live exciting events as often as you wish – in virtual reality (VR). 
The exciting recordings make it seem as if you were actually at the centre of the action.
As a further feature, you can buy tickets for the journey with the Alpenexpress Coastiality in Europa-Park directly in this app. Do you want another goody? When you buy a ticket for the Alpenexpress Coastiality via this app, its 360° video in this app will be activated for you at no cost. And don’t worry, we have also integrated short trailers in the app – this means that you can take a quick look at the 360° video in advance, before you make your decision.

translations.long_description:
Aimerais-tu visionner un tour à bord d’un grand huit en réalité virtuelle depuis ton salon ? 

As-tu envie de découvrir les sensations procurées par les univers virtuels qui sont proposés à l’échelle mondiale à bord des grands huit Coatiality ?

Ou alors, préfères-tu profiter d’extraits à 360° d’une sélection d’événements ?

Bienvenue dans Coastiality, une sélection unique en son genre de contenus et d’expériences de haute qualité en réalité virtuelle.
translations.short_description:
COASTIALITY – Découvre des univers incroyables ! 
 
Aimerais-tu visionner un tour à bord d’un grand huit en réalité virtuelle depuis ton salon ? Viens découvrir les sensations procurées par les univers virtuels qui sont proposés à l’échelle mondiale à bord des grands huit Coastiality et profite de vidéos on-ride spectaculaires à 360° d’une sélection d’attractions de différents parcs de loisirs.

translations.long_description:
Hast Du Lust, Dir eine echte Achterbahnfahrt in VR von Deinem Wohnzimmer aus anzusehen?

Möchtest Du erleben, wie sich virtuelle Welten anfühlen, welche weltweit in Freizeitparks auf Coastiality Achterbahnen angeboten werden?

Oder möchtest Du Dich von 360° Live-Mitschnitten ausgewählter Events begeistern lassen?

Willkommen bei Coastiality, einer einzigartigen Auswahl an qualitativ-hochwertigen Virtual Reality Erlebnissen.
translations.short_description:
COASTIALITY - Entdecke neue unglaubliche Welten! 
 
Hast Du Lust, Dir eine echte Achterbahnfahrt in VR von Deinem Wohnzimmer aus anzusehen? Erlebe, wie sich virtuelle Welten anfühlen, die weltweit in Freizeitparks auf Coastiality Achterbahnen angeboten werden und genieße spektakuläre 360° On-Rides ausgewählter Attraktionen verschiedener Freizeitparks.

changelog.change_log:
Thank you for using the Coastiality app!

The update includes:
* Optimisation of players
* Improved design
* Gear VR Controller support

Thank you for your great support! In order to constantly improve your experience in the app we will provide regular updates.
With this update you will now be able to see whether a video is animated right in the video library. We also fixed some small bugs.

Not only the Coastiality app has been completely reworked – you can also look forward to many new experiences!

NEW 360° videos in the Coastiality app:
- BLUE FIRE Megacoaster Powered by GAZPROM – Europa-Park
- Fjord-Rafting – Europa-Park
- French Revolution 2 – Lotte World Adventure
- Gyro Drop 2 – Lotte World Adventure
- Alpenexpress feat. Sky Explorers – Europa-Park
- Alpenexpress feat. Ed Euromaus (Update) – Europa-Park
- Pegasus feat. Happy Family (Update) – Europa-Park

NEW functions in the Coastiality app:
- Coastiality VR ride tickets for the Alpenexpress in Europa-Park
- Ed Euromaus on the Alpenexpress Coastiality – Europa-Park
- Sky Explorers on the Alpenexpress Coastiality – Europa-Park

NEW Support:
Something doesn’t work or you have a question? Visit support.coastiality.com
Missed Swiss sensation DJ BoBo’s exclusive MYSTORIAL world tour launch at the new Europa-Park Arena? No need to worry! Catch in again in stunning full 360° video exclusively on the Coastiality App.

Need more Virtual Reality and 360° video in your life? 
Then the brand new Swiss Bob Run and spooky Horror Nights Atlantis are a must see! 
We've also added fully 360° videos of our infamous Europa-Park Horror Nights and the Spook Me! musical. 
Besides this new content, small bug fixes and tweaks will make your 360° Virtuality Reality experience better than ever.
For further information and assistance please contact info@coastiality.com.

We welcome Nigloland to the Coastiality App! 
Now, Alpina Blitz, Le Schlitt' Express and the incredible Donjon de l'Extrême can be experienced in 360° Virtual Reality (VR)!
Moreover, Europa-Park's fascinating viewing platform 'Euro-Tower' has been added, too. We hope you enjoy the view!
